content:
# List of intents:

Intent Id: BAp01
Intent Name: Book_Appointment
Intent description: Make a reservation with a doctor for a specific date and time.  
Slots:
Slot Id: 986c
SlotName: Information required
possibleValues:
	· Patient's name, 
	· preferred date and time of the visit, 
	· insurance information.
	· Doctor's name
Slot Id: 876G
SlotName: Methods
possibleValues:
	· Email
	· Phone call
	· In-person


Intent Id: MAp02
Intent Name: Modify_Appointment
Intent description: Change the date or time of an existing appointment.
Slots:
Slot Id: 567C
SlotName: Information required
possibleValues:
	· Patient's name, 
	· Scheduled date and time of the visit,
	· preferred date and time of the visit, 
Slot Id: 983S
SlotName: Methods
possibleValues:
	· Phone call
	· In-person


Intent Id: CAp03
Intent Name:  Cancel_Appointment
Intent description: Remove a scheduled appointment.
Slots:
Slot Id: 258M
SlotName: Information required
possibleValues:
	· Patient's name
	· Scheduled date and time of the visit
	· Doctor's name
Slot Id: 876D
SlotName: Methods
possibleValues:
	· Email
	· Phone call
	· In-person
	· Text/sms


Intent Id: CAp04
Intent Name: Confirm_Appointment
Intent description: Get confirmation of an appointment made by the patient.
Slots:
Slot Id: 096F
SlotName: Information required
possibleValues:
	· Patient's name, 
	· Scheduled date and time of the visit,
	· Doctor's name
Slot Id: 398G
SlotName: Methods
possibleValues:
	· Email
	· Phone call
	· In-person
	· Text/sms

Intent Id: CAp05
Intent Name: Check_Availability
Intent description: Check whether a doctor is available on a certain date and time.
Slots:
Slot Id: 675K
SlotName:
SlotName: Information required
possibleValues:
	· Patient's name, 
	· preferred date and time of the visit
	· Doctor's name
Slot Id: 421M
SlotName:Methods
possibleValues:
	· Email
	· Phone call
	· In-person

# Instructions:
I want you identify the best intent from the list above for the utterance you'll be provided and also please  extract all relevant slots .
Return your response in Json.
 Also include in your answer key "output", where the values of the "output" should be a dictionary where the key of this dictionary is the intent id and the values is a subdictionary where the keys are the slot ids associated with the given intent and the values are the slot values. 
For the slotName "methods" return only  one of the given possibleValues associated with the chosen intent, that is actually present in the utterance . If no values present in the utterance for slotName "methods" in the chosen intent,  return "none" only once for the corresponding slotId.
For the SlotName: "Information required" fill all of possibleValues associated with the chosen intent. If no possibleValues of this slot Id present in the utterance for the chosen intent, please state "none" for the every corresponding value. 

#The utterance:

"Good morning. I'd like to know Dr. Morozov-Smith availability."
